Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory103.png'}
{3: 'PheeEEeeeewWWW—'}
{3: '(The frigid wind continues to howl outside.)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Why do those guys get to celebrate Christmas in a warm and cozy house, while I have to deal with these puny Corrupted out here in the cold?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm not even breaking a sweat...!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: '(A Corrupted goes flying into the air.)'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But I can't even have a rest...!", 4: '1'}
{3: '(She smashes another Corrupted.)'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "One after another. Wave after wave. They're showing no signs of stopping!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Rgh—! Grawrrr—!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Stupid, stupid Corrupted! You're gonna blow out my eardrums!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If I have to battle an Ascendant, that'll get my blood pumping.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But I'm bored out of my mind fighting these weaklings!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If Lucia hadn't practically begged me for help, only an idiot would come to a place like this in the middle of the night.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Grrgghh—Rarrghhh—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Finally afraid, eh? Good. Saves me the effort.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Looks like I can finally see the silhouette of the clock from here. Hallelujah!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Damn... I'd kill to go back and stretch out in the warm cabin...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But as long as I ring that old bell and shoot into the sky, I'll get some brownie points with the commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "And that means I'll beat Lucia for a change. Then again...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'When Lucia told me she wanted to throw a Christmas party with everyone and needed my help, I had absolutely no desire to...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...I'd have rather stuck a needle in my eye!", 4: '1'}
{3: '(Static)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "But I eavesdropped on her conversation with Lee just to make sure they didn't do anything stupid.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'When I heard her say something about "Operation Celebrate Christmas to Cheer Up Liv", I about laughed my *** off!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What a stupid and boring plan!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If Lucia hadn't sounded so pathetic, I could've been warm and cozy in Babylonia's war room right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...But seeing as Liv is a friend, I guess it doesn't hurt to make an exception every now and then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "This sorta grunt work is best left to Lucia, but she's just trying to pull the strings. She really pisses me off!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'AH! L-L-L-LUCIA—?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You've been mumbling to yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'W-what? How long have you been on the channel?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've been calling your name for the past few minutes.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Do you get off on eavesdropping or something?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Hey... The signal is cut... Karen... Hurry up... It's almost...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Alright, alright. You're gonna make me go deaf.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Well, everything I said was true. Who cares if Lucia hears it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Anyway... I need to get to the top of the clock tower...', 4: '1'}
